channel.title: Marketplace on Day 1 HPC (Staging)
channel.description: Recent content in Marketplace on Day 1 HPC (Staging)

item.title: Benchmarking the NVIDIA Clara Parabricks germline pipeline on AWS
item.description: This blog provides an overview of NVIDIA’s Clara Parabricks along with a guide on how to use Parabricks within the AWS Marketplace. It focuses on germline analysis for whole genome and whole exome applications using GPU accelerated bwa-mem and GATK’s HaplotypeCaller. Read the full post at the AWS HPC Blog.
